timeline.bodyText: Could you take Boundedness as an example to improve the Javadoc a little? It's still not very clear what is bounded means here, and streaming may also produce bounded input.
timeline.author: wuchong
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -98,6 +98,11 @@
 		 * {@code TableEnvironment} session configurations.
 		 */
 		ReadableConfig getConfiguration();
+
+		/**
+		 * @return true if input of the sink is bounded, otherwise it is a unbounded input.

replies.bodyText:
Now it depends on whether the {@link TableEnvironment} execution mode is batch.
In the future, the new sink interface will infer from input to source, see {@link Source#getBoundedness}.

What do you think?
replies.author: JingsongLi
